meanings.definition: A Bulgarian coin worth one-hundredth of a lev.
meanings.sent1: In Bulgaria, you can buy a candy with a stotinka.
meanings.sent2: I found a stotinka on the street while walking.
meanings.sent3: The stotinka rolled away like a tiny shiny beetle.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter tinkled like a stotinka in the air.
meanings.sent5: The stotinka gleamed under the sunlight, catching my eye.

meanings.definition: A small monetary unit in Bulgaria.
meanings.sent1: Grandma gave me a stotinka to spend at the market.
meanings.sent2: The shopkeeper handed back my change, including a stotinka.
meanings.sent3: The stotinka danced out of my pocket and onto the floor.
meanings.sent4: His words were as valuable as a stotinka in a sea of coins.
meanings.sent5: I saved every stotinka in my piggy bank for a special treat.
